tool_description: This tool checks whether a phone number is valid and retrieves its associated metadata, such as the validity status and additional information.

api_list.name: /v1/validatephone
api_list.description: API Ninjas Validate Phone API endpoint. Returns metadata (including whether it is valid) for a given phone number.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The phone number to check. If the country is not specified, the 3-digit country code prefix must be included.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO-3166 country code that the phone number belongs to.
